title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Roommate Poison
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A travel blogger slowly poisons her dormitory roommate over two weeks, adding small doses of antifreeze to shared food, driven by jealousy over social media success.

death_teaser: She said the green tea was for detox. She wasn't wrong.
